{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Mawtiyima Forest|It|Mawtiyima Forest}} is a forest made of enormous fluorescent mushrooms.</p><p>Mawtiyima is described as "an energy form created by the ancient dreams and memories of the forest." This energy fights against [[The Withering]] to ensure the health of the forest, and even seems to be able to communicate with the [[Aranara]]. In an ancient tongue, the name once meant "human death."<ref>{{Ref/Loading|Sumeru|Mawtiyima}}</ref></p>}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|The dense forest that defends northern Sumeru. Monumental flora that cannot be found anywhere else grow here.<br>This place was once tainted by the filth that corroded the entire world. It was only after much revivification and purification that it returned to being this giant forest once again.|[[Expedition]] description}}
{{Description|Here, the pomegranate sings and the apples clap.|Viewpoint, [[Aranaga's Little Garden]]}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Mawtiyima may come from {{Lang|mawt|ar=مَوْت|ar_tl=death}} and Yima, the Avestan name for the Iranian mythical hero Jamshid.
